data: {"generalSituation":"The northeast monsoon will bring slightly cooler weather to southern China in the next couple of days. A band of clouds will bring a few rain patches to the region tomorrow. Under the influence of a replenishment of the monsoon, it will be windy over the coast of Guangdong towards the weekend. Meanwhile, another broad band of clouds will cover the region and the northern part of the South China Sea. Under the influence of the anticyclone aloft, the weather is expected to improve over the coastal areas during the weekend. Besides, Tropical Cyclone Kalmaegi will move across the central and southern parts of the South China Sea and towards the vicinity of central Vietnam in the next few days.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20251104","week":"Tuesday","forecastWind":"East to northeast force 4 to 5, occasionally force 6 offshore and on high ground at first.","forecastWeather":"Cloudy with one or two rain patches.
